thread.section_title: Rome Times Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great weekend city break
thread.title_full: Great weekend city break - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Lancslad007
title: Great weekend city break
text: 17th - 20th March 2017. We booked this hotel as part of a city break package and were not disappointed. A very modern boutique style hotel, very clean, brilliant position for visiting all the sites of ancient Rome, very efficient, friendly and helpful staff and a wonderful breakfast included. Would definitely stay here again.
